column4: so of the major video manufacturers, only Intel is willing to provide their hardware specs to allow X to properly support them with open source drivers?  but Intel's gfx chips are all on board aren't they?
kind of  , they made open drivers for network cards and tools and for gfx cards
and the made a teribe driver witch broke eeprome on some of them
but all their graphics chips are integrated right?  no actual video cards eh?
